--- title: "First live stream 🎂" date: "2020-01-13 21:00:00" --- ![](/img/twitch.jpeg) Colin will live stream on Twitch how to build a Shiny application with {golem}.
  • 👨‍💻 Colin Fay, @_ColinFay
  • 🔗 https://www.twitch.tv/thinkr_fr
  • ⏳ __2020-01-13 21:00:00 Paris Time__.
    • See Event in Other Timezones ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} date <- lubridate::ymd_hms("2020-01-13 21:00:00", tz = "Europe/Paris") lubridate::with_tz(date, "UTC") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-01-13 20:00:00 UTC" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "America/New_York") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-01-13 15:00:00 EST" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "America/Los_Angeles") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-01-13 12:00:00 PST" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} lubridate::with_tz(date, "Australia/Sydney") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "2020-01-14 07:00:00 AEDT" ``` ::: :::
